thread.title: Great hotel!
thread.title_full: Great hotel! - Review of Hotel Beacon, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Nanette714
title: Great hotel!
text:
We had a very nice King bed room with a small kitchenette (fridge, stove, microwave, Keurig). Fridge was great for keeping beverages and restaurant leftovers. Quiet room facing 75th street. Only complaint was the bathroom was too small--otherwise would have given it 5 stars.
Room Tip: If you are seeing a show at the Beacon Theatre, this is the place to stay. Literally right next doo... See more room tips
